nodes.text: Bread pudding was a foodstuff made by the Opaline Creed, a religious faction on the Outer Rim planet Crucival, made on their holy days during the time of the Galactic Empire. Edible to humans, the pudding featured sweet fruits and a charred crust which Pira Ten—a member of the Creed—adored, despite the fact that it made her itch the next morning.

On the eve of the Hieroprince's Ascension, an event marked by the Creed, Hazram Namir, another Creed member who used the name Umu Seven, shared his bowl of bread pudding with Ten after she was punished by the Creed. In 0 BBY, some time after the Creed's demise, Namir and Ten, in the middle of a battlefield, talked about the pudding shortly before the latter died of injuries she had received during the battle.
Bread pudding was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
